channel.name: Cam_ComponentImagesRequested
channel.comment: Number of images requested by other Fprime components

channel.name: Cam_CommandImagesRequested
channel.comment: Number of images commanded from the ground

channel.name: Cam_ImagesSent
channel.comment: Number of images sent for downlink

channel.comment: Number of bytes sent for downlink

channel.name: Cam_LatestCallbackId
channel.comment: The latest callback ID that triggerd an image to be taken
